Text:
Hi Ray,
Followed you on demonoid when you first started and following you on pirate bay and all I can say is thank you.  With my daughter in and out of hospitals you help us pass the time with all of your hallmark, lifetime movies you upload.  Simple act of kindness
If you ever need any movies let me know as I have over 210 xmas movies (lots from you) in my collection
@lovexmas, It is alot of work just trying to keep up with all the new ones as they air. I have older xmas movies also, but am limited on bandwisth, so only upload here when in demand.
Thanks very much and God Bless!

Hi Ray,
Thanks again for all that you do.  The quality is great.  We appreciate all of the work you put into it as it is time consuming.
thanks Raycort. can you upload the new movie golden christmas 3 from ION. can't find it anywhere
Another title for the movie Golden Christmas 3 is called ....LOVE FOR CHRISTMAS.  I watched it on T.V. a few nights ago under that title.
Hi thanks for the uplods raycourt.  do you have a golden christmas 3 or christmas in paradise?
Hi raycourt thank you for all that you have done so far but do you have a golden christmas 3 or christmas in paradise?
I can't tell you how much I appreciate all your great work!!
